item.help: item's key within the storage device associated with this question
item.name: itemkey

item.help: For Storage of PERMANENT Type, the data are saved persistent in device memory . Storage of TEMPORARY Type works the same way in every respect, except that all data is cleared each time the app closes.
item.name: storageType

item.help: item's key within the storage device associated with this question
item.name: itemkey

item.help: For Storage of PERMANENT Type, the data are saved persistent in device memory . Storage of TEMPORARY Type works the same way in every respect, except that all data is cleared each time the app closes.
item.name: storageType

item.help: For Storage of PERMANENT Type, the data are saved persistent in device memory . Storage of TEMPORARY Type works the same way in every respect, except that all data is cleared each time the app closes.
item.name: storageType

item.help: Which storage function is called when the button is pressed.
item.name: action

item.help: Item's Value . This is applicable only for SET ITEM Action
item.name: itemvalue

item.help: ID of Input where to save storage value . This is applicable only for GET ITEM Action
item.name: inputID

item.help: Auto click button when page is loaded.
item.name: auto_click
